5. No stock warning message when ordering a quantity more than what is available.

6. No stock status on cart page.

7. No real time stock checking on checkout page.

8. Opening notifications wont let me close it by clicking again, only by refreshing the page.

9. Need a sample order confirmation email to screensot.
